idea-plugin.name: Protocol Buffer Linter
idea-plugin.description:
Protolint plugin for all products based on IntelliJ Platform (IntelliJ IDEA, GoLand, RubyMine, WebStorm, PhpStorm, PyCharm, AppCode, etc.)



The plugin does not require configuration by default, for the majority of projects it should work out of the box.
It is assumed that protolint executable is installed and available in your PATH by default.

You can configure the path to the protolint executable and its config through Preferences -> Tools -> Protocol Buffer Linter

NOTE: protobuf-jetbrains-plugin must be installed, however, this plugin is removed at the moment. You have to install the plugin from disk. Here are the steps.
  1. Download the zip from its release page
  2. Install from disk according to the instruction
